name: Episkeptis
tag_list: advertising, marketing, promotion, bar, restaurant, tavernas, clubs, cafes
overview:
Episkeptis.gr is a brand new application made in Greece that allows users to sign up using either their email address or their facebook account and discover the best places to dine or party in Greece. Your friends find, rate and suggest the best restaurants, bars, clubs, taverna, cafes in Greece!

Users can sing up using their facebook credentials and bring/invite their friends over, the application is built in such a way that allows users to see friend-only content, in other words read the reviews of friends - the people who they know and can trust their honest opinion.
